name: Lava Lumps
description:
A casual multiplayer party game made  for the GMTK gamejam 2021! 

Push lumps into the lava to prevent your floating island from sinking, and push your friends into the lava to score points and win the idol!

We also support a single-player experience.

How to Lump (Play):

  • Score points for pushing other players into lava
  • But wait! Players must join together to push NPC lumps off the island to stop it from sinking faster!
  • If the idol melts into the lava, NOBODY wins. 
  • Balance your motives: Collaborating vs Competing
  • The player with the most points when the timer runs out wins the idol!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Spacebar 
  • Look: Mouse
  • LUMP THUMP: Spacebar + LMB
  • Also supports PS4 Dual Shock Controller

SPECIAL MOVE: LUMP THUMP (Stuns Other Lumps)
Jump (Spacebar) + Attack (LMB)
